title: 14 day supsension
body:
im out lol. i have had a 5 game chat restriction before, but this is by far the dumbest thing ive seen. today, i did not say 1 derogatory thing towards others, instead i carried my final game as wukong and still get punished for it. somehow, you guys dont even read chat logs i feel like. i feel like it turns around and instead of me getting CONSTANTLY ASSAULTED during the game by my flaming teammates, I GET THE BAN!?!? Chat logs dont help because it only shows my end, which is entirely backwards in my opinion

you want it, you can have it. send a message to me for this account because im not playing your garbage piece of shit "bully free" system where liberals who get scared to get called out on their mistakes get rewarded. it has all champs and is level 32 at the moment with gold status

2 years in a row youve fucked me for season rewards within the WEEK of getting them. kiss my fuckin ass riot

Well because there are people like you who come to post here, tell others to hurt themselves offline, and lie. Not everyone here is like yourself.  Why RIOT allows you to post here when your account is permanently banned is beyond me, but you're a very toxic person and need to seek help offline.

Come on man, stop lying and making harassing statements towards myself and others. I told you once and I will say it here. 1 v 1 me. You claim you're going to have such a bad experience doing so, but I think you might learn a nice lesson about talking too much.

You're in silver... it's not masters. You're not some untouchable player I couldn't beat. It would actually be easy in my opinion. Also, your rant was deleted because it is abusively toxic, you know that little notification you get next to new replies. I am sure you do. When you clicked it today you clearly saw an arbitrator remove your post and that one was one of the finer moments in proving how toxic you are to everyone else.
Ok. If you say so. Again. I am inviting you, when and if you do, get unbanned to play me. I would love the opportunity to play. GL Hf.
Yet you play at least 2 games a day ...

2. If you would post your chatlogs, perhaps we could assist you in determining why your chat was considered abusive.

If you can provide your chat logs, we can help you figure out what behavior may have lead to this. If you have ANY interest in considering your *League* career I will encourage you to edit your post, as offering to give away accounts can lead to permanent suspension, and it seems that right now you're extremely frustrated and possibly posting in frustration.

If we can help you understand your punishment and avoid future account issues, I'd rather do that than see you permanently suspended for a moment of frustration.

I've already uninstalled. if they wanna ban it fine. idgaf at this point. frustrated or not, i'm done lmfao. i have absolutely 0 enjoyment playing games where teams feed their asses off and then begin to flame because 1 or 2 teammates keep trying to play and stay in the game, im tired of the annoying banter from young kids who play this and get so butthurt because "no one talks to me that way". let em have it. i. dont. care. ive played for 6 years and not 1 other game ive ever played BANS you or ANYONE ELSE for doing you. but ya know, this game consistantly lets me down. from others to the way its driven. take me back to season 3 when it was fun.

like i said im SO done. this game has lost flavor and everyone in it gets so offended so fuckin easy. you can spam a ping and someone goes off. 

thats it. have a good one
Every other game I have played (many of them for 10+ years now) has a system in place to ban players who are constantly harassing or abusing other players after being warned not to do that.
